title: False 'Attempt to Join Queue Failed' Penalty
body:
I was waiting to join the game and "trying to reconnect" message poped up.
Then, i closed it and start from the beginning but I got the penalty. 
First two times I had to wait 5mins or sth and now Queue Dodge Timer up to 15mins. 
Im afraid that my penalty  time has been increased and it's not at my fault.
Where should I ask about this problem adn adjust it? Or how to contact riot ppl to not give me a penalty about this?

replies.body: So essentially it sounds like you had been placed into a match and went through champ select, weren't able to get connected for some reason and chose to exit out of the match instead of trying to get back in. Basically, this ended up in you being marked for dodging the game it sounds like, which is why you got the small 5 game LPQ. You mentioned the "first two times" so it seems like you kept repeating those dodges which led to high LPQ's since those dodges were in a short amount of time. You'll need to wait that time out and play through the entire game in order to get rid of the LPQ games.
